Index.meta_description: Professional audit management platform for restaurants, retail, and hospitality. Track audits, manage actions, and ensure compliance across all your locations.

AboutPage.meta_description: Learn about AuditFlow - the professional audit management platform for restaurants, retail, and hospitality.
AboutPage.hero_description: AuditFlow helps teams maintain quality standards across all their locations with smart audits and action tracking.
AboutPage.what_description: AuditFlow is a modern audit management platform designed for businesses with multiple locations. Create custom audit checklists, conduct inspections on any device, and automatically track corrective actions until completion.
AboutPage.industry1_description: Food safety, hygiene, and quality checks
AboutPage.step1_description: Build custom checklists for your specific needs
AboutPage.step2_description: Inspect on any device with photo capture
AboutPage.pricing_subtitle: Start free, upgrade as you grow
AboutPage.trust_text: 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

FeaturesPage.meta_description: Discover all features of AuditFlow for professional audit management.
FeaturesPage.title: Features
FeaturesPage.subtitle: Everything you need for professional audits
FeaturesPage.feature1_description: Create customizable audit templates with weighted scoring and photo requirements.
FeaturesPage.feature2_description: Manage audits across all your locations from one central dashboard.
FeaturesPage.feature3_description: Automatically generate corrective actions from audit findings.
FeaturesPage.feature4_description: Conduct audits on any device with our responsive design.
FeaturesPage.feature4_detail1: Works on phone, tablet, and desktop
FeaturesPage.feature5_description: Generate reports and gain insights with powerful analytics.
FeaturesPage.cta_description: Start your 14-day free trial today. No credit card required.

PricingPage.meta_description: Simple, transparent pricing for AuditFlow. Start free, upgrade as you grow.
PricingPage.title: Pricing
PricingPage.subtitle: Simple, transparent pricing for every team size
PricingPage.faq1_question: Can I try AuditFlow for free?
PricingPage.faq1_answer: Yes! Start with our Free plan or get a 14-day free trial of Professional. No credit card required.
PricingPage.faq2_answer: Absolutely. Upgrade or downgrade at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
PricingPage.faq3_question: What payment methods do you accept?
PricingPage.faq3_answer: We accept all major credit cards, iDEAL, and SEPA direct debit for European customers.

Landing.headline: Internal audits, simplified
Landing.subheadline: Track audits, manage actions, ensure compliance. Built for restaurants, retail, and hospitality.
Landing.free_trial: 14-day free trial. No credit card required.
Landing.feature1_description: Customizable templates with scoring and photo capture
Landing.feature2_description: Manage all your locations from one dashboard
Landing.feature3_description: Auto-generate tasks from findings with deadlines

Hero.title: Streamline Your <important>Internal Audits</important> with Confidence
Hero.description: The all-in-one platform for managing audits, tracking corrective actions, and ensuring compliance across all your locations. Built for restaurants, retail, and hospitality.

Features.section_title: Everything You Need for Professional Audits
Features.section_description: From audit creation to action tracking, AuditFlow provides all the tools you need to maintain quality standards across your organization.
Features.feature1_description: Create customizable audit templates with weighted scoring, photo requirements, and automated action creation.
Features.feature2_description: Manage audits across all your locations with centralized dashboards and location-specific insights.
Features.feature3_description: Automatically generate corrective actions from audit findings with photo verification and deadline tracking.
Features.feature4_description: Conduct audits on any device with our responsive design and offline capabilities.
Features.feature5_description: Assign inspectors, managers, and admins with role-based permissions and notifications.
Features.feature6_description: Generate PDF reports, track trends, and gain insights with powerful analytics dashboards.
Features.feature_description: Professional-grade features designed for modern audit management.

Pricing.section_title: Choose the Right Plan for Your Business
Pricing.section_description: Flexible pricing that scales with your organization. All plans include a 14-day free trial.

FAQ.question1: How does the 14-day free trial work?
FAQ.answer1: Start using AuditFlow immediately with full access to all features. No credit card required. After 14 days, choose a plan that fits your needs.
FAQ.answer2: Yes! AuditFlow is designed for multi-location businesses. Assign managers to each location and get a centralized view of all your audits.
FAQ.question3: What types of audits can I create?
FAQ.answer3: Create any type of internal audit - food safety, cleanliness, compliance, equipment checks, and more. Customize scoring, add photos, and set weights for each item.
FAQ.answer4: When an audit item fails, AuditFlow automatically creates an action item. Managers receive notifications and can respond with photos to verify completion.
